verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The time we have is precious,
There is no time to waste,
To be looking over shoulders
To see who'll take our place.
We need to have a vision
And not a sense of lack:
For we'll never make decisions
If we keep on looking back.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
God looks for a people,
The faithful and the strong,
Who speak to situations,
Cause things to be born,
Captives of a vision,
Singers of a song,
Who only live to see His kingdom come.
Who only live to see His kingdom come.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The fields are white to harvest,
The labourers are few,
The word comes to the leaders,
What now will you do?
Will you sit in introspection
Until the coming day,
Or will you rise like young men
And will you lead the way?

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
We can't boast of tomorrow,
We only have today;
The past lies dead behind us
Forgotten along the way.
Let faith rise up among us,
We'll see His will be done,
As we run this race with joy
To see His kingdom come.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
So will we be that people
Or will He pass us by?
Is there no one among us
Who will even dare to try?
Or will His zeal consume us
Until our lives be one?
To see Satan's kingdom overthrown
In the name of God's own Son.
